Uses of Package
peregrine.os

Packages that use peregrine.os
peregrine.io.buffer Buffer related IO classes. 
peregrine.io.chunk Code for dealing which chunks (which are fragments of partition files). 
peregrine.io.util IO utilities, usually for dealing with multiple files, closing resoures, etc. 
peregrine.os Operating system specific extentions including mlock, fadvise, fallocate, etc. 
peregrine.util.netty Extensions and additional code for using Netty and async IO. 
 

Classes in peregrine.os used by peregrine.io.buffer
ByteBufferCloser
          A closeable which is smart enough to work on byte buffers.
 

Classes in peregrine.os used by peregrine.io.chunk
MappedFileReader
          Facade around a MappedByteBuffer but we also support mlock on the mapped pages, and closing all dependent resources in the foreground via close() without having to wait for the GC.
 

Classes in peregrine.os used by peregrine.io.util
pwd.Passwd
           
 

Classes in peregrine.os used by peregrine.os
BaseMappedFile
           
PlatformException
           
pwd.Passwd
           
resource.RLIMIT
           
resource.RlimitStruct
           
unistd.StatStruct
           
vfs.StatfsStruct
           
 

Classes in peregrine.os used by peregrine.util.netty
MappedFileReader
          Facade around a MappedByteBuffer but we also support mlock on the mapped pages, and closing all dependent resources in the foreground via close() without having to wait for the GC.
